庚.definition: age; seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]; seventh in order; letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; ancient Chinese compass point: 255°; hepta

庚午.definition: seventh year G7 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1990 or 2050

庚子.definition: 37th year G1 of the 60-year cycle, e.g. 1960 or 2020

庚子國變.definition: the crisis year of 1900 involving the Boxer uprising and the eight nation military invasion

庚寅.definition: twenty-seventh year G3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2010 or 2070

庚戌.definition: forty-seventh year G11 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1970 or 2030

庚申.definition: fifty-seventh year G9 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1980 or 2040

庚糖.definition: heptose (CH2O)7, monosaccharide with seven carbon atoms

庚辰.definition: seventeenth year G5 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2000 or 2060
